1.text: Preheat the oven to 390 °F (199 °C) and prepare a baking sheet.

2.text: Whisk the flour, sugar, and salt in a large bowl.

3.text: Mix the vegan butter into the dry ingredients until it's crumbly.

4.text: Stir in dairy-free milk and vinegar to make a sticky dough.

5.text: Knead the scone dough and roll it 1⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) thick.

6.text: Cut the dough into 2 1⁄2 to 3 in (6.4 to 7.6 cm) circles.

7.text: Place the scones on the sheet and brush them with dairy-free milk.

8.text: Bake the scones for 10 to 12 minutes.

9.text: Add your favorite spices to the dry ingredients.

10.text: Mix vegan chocolate chips into the dough for decadent scones.

11.text: Include lemon zest or vanilla extract to add subtle flavor.

12.text: Toss in a handful of fruit to make the vegan scones naturally sweet.

13.text: Add 2 tablespoons (7 g) of chopped fresh herbs for a savory flavor.
